title: Nivea For Men Active3 Body Wash for Body, Hair & Shave, 16.9-Ounce Bottles (Pack of 3)
Nautica Classic for Men by Nautica 3.4 oz 100ml EDT Spray
description: Introduced in 1992, Nautica features watery florals and tones of aromatic woods. Its recommended use is for daytime occasions.When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied

title: Got2b Ultra Glued Invincible Styling Gel, 6-Ounce
description: This gel’s hold is no joke!  So put it down and slowly back away if you’re not up for the strongest gel hold ever!  This non-sticky, no-flake formula is powered by a high-tech styling agent – we call it Alpha XTR.  Call it what you want, it lets you take your hair to new heights.  Or do your own thing and cement your individual style.  And when the party comes to an end, easily un-glue with a little shampoo.  Go ahead – style away!

title: Nourishing Care Shea Butter Moisturizing Cream Beauty Bar by Dove, 4 Ounce, 6 Count
description: Beauty Bar for smooth radiant skin. Give your skin the extra nourishment it craves. Dove 1/4 moisturizing cream infused with a rich blend of shea butter melts deep into dry, dull skin, leaving it soft, smooth and even toned. Let the absorbant, creamy lather and warm, delicate scent envelop your senses. Use daily for deeply nourished beautifully radiant skin.

title: Phisoderm Anti-Blemish Body Wash, 10-Ounce
description: PH balanced anti-blemish body wash clears up acne breakouts for smooth, balanced skin
